news.title: Flood Management and River Embankment Guidelines
news.content: Patna High Court issues comprehensive guidelines for flood management and river embankment construction in Bihar, emphasizing scientific planning and community participation.

news.title: Rural Education Infrastructure Development
news.content: The court directs Bihar government to improve rural education infrastructure, ensuring proper school buildings, qualified teachers, and educational resources in remote areas.

news.title: Agricultural Credit and Farmer Welfare Schemes
news.content: Patna High Court mandates proper implementation of agricultural credit schemes and farmer welfare programs, ensuring timely disbursement and transparent processes.
